FRANCI1.original: You're too far away from the ~y~viewpoint~s~. You won't be able to spot the blackmailer.
FRANCI1.translated: 你离~y~观景台~s~太远了，会看不到勒索者的。

FRANCI1.original: Take the photographs on the storage device to ~y~Francis.
FRANCI1.translated: 将含有照片的存储设备交给~y~Francis。

FRANCI1.original: Look out for the blackmailer, he's using his cell phone.
FRANCI1.translated: 寻找勒索者，他正在使用手机。

FRANCI1.original: The blackmailer is still in the area. Search for him.
FRANCI1.translated: 勒索者还在这片区域，寻找他。

FRANCI1.original: You're losing the ~r~blackmailer.~s~ Don't let him get away.
FRANCI1.translated: 你要跟丢~r~勒索者~s~了，别让他跑了。

FRANCI1.original: Go to the ~y~viewpoint~s~ off Union Drive East.
FRANCI1.translated: 前往Union快速路东段的~y~观景台。

FRANCI1.original: Call the blackmailer's cell and look to see who answers their phone. Keep him talking until you identify him.
FRANCI1.translated: 联系勒索者，注意观察接电话的人。找到他前与他保持通话。

FRANCI1.original: The blackmailer will be somewhere around here.
Wait for the text from Francis to get the blackmailer's phone number.
FRANCI1.translated: 等待Francis将勒索者的电话号码发过来。

FRANCI1.original: The ~r~blackmailer~s~ is fleeing on foot. Take him out.
FRANCI1.translated: ~r~勒索者~s~正在徒步逃跑，干掉他。

FRANCI1.original: The ~r~blackmailer~s~ has entered a car, don't let him get away.
Hey, come back here so I can kill you.
